item.title: About me
item.description: Hey there! I’m a software engineer working at Subito. I wanted to start this blog to share some ideas about software development and my work in a tech company. I spent half of my life reading and learning stuff on the Internet. I love technology and knowledge sharing. I like the idea that someone can read my posts and find them somehow useful.

item.title: How you should handle incidents in your team or organization
item.description: Setup an incident management in your team or organization

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?
